text:
@GregAbbott_TX @GregAbbott_TX if u REALLY cared 4 #Texans u would make MASKS in public still mandatory to protect your constituents & CREATE JOBS MAKING MASKS!
Masks keep people who have NO SYMPTOMS from unknowingly infecting others with #COVID19. #WearMasks #SaveLives
